scripts.eslint: git diff --name-only --diff-filter=dx origin/master... | grep apps/site/assets/js/.*\.js | xargs apps/site/assets/node_modules/.bin/eslint -c apps/site/assets/.eslintrc.js
scripts.eslint:fix: git diff --name-only --diff-filter=dx origin/master... | grep apps/site/assets/js/.*\.js | xargs apps/site/assets/node_modules/.bin/eslint -c apps/site/assets/.eslintrc.js --fix
